com.lowagie.text.rtf.table
Class RtfTable

java.lang.Object
  com.lowagie.text.rtf.RtfElement
      com.lowagie.text.rtf.table.RtfTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
RtfBasicElement, RtfElementInterface
public class RtfTable
extends RtfElement

The RtfTable wraps a Table. INTERNAL USE ONLY

Version:

Author:
Mark Hall (Mark.Hall@mail.room3b.eu), Steffen Stundzig, Benoit Wiart, Thomas Bickel (tmb99@inode.at)
